revised_title: The Fungus of Ringworm: Trichophyton Tonsurans and Its Characteristics
tldr: The author discusses the fungus Trichophyton tonsurans, which causes ringworm, a common skin infection. They describe the characteristics of the fungus, its growth patterns, and its relationship to other fungi. The author also presents their findings from experiments attempting to cultivate the fungus artificially, highlighting the differences between Trichophyton tonsurans and other common fungi.
